verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, for their <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> has <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> Me."

But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H1272>flee<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> So he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa,<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H591>ship<s%> which was <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H5414>paid<s%> the <S%H7939>fare,<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into it to <S%H935>go<s%> with them to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2904>hurled<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>storm<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> so that the <S%H591>ship<s%> was about to <S%H7665>break<s%> up.

Then the <S%H4419>sailors<s%> <S%H3372>became<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to his <S%H430>god,<s%> and they <S%H2904>threw<s%> the <S%H3627>cargo<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H591>ship<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H7043>lighten<s%> [it] for them. But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> had <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>below<s%> into the <S%H3411>hold<s%> of the <S%H5600>ship,<s%> <S%H7901>lain<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> and <S%H7290>fallen<s%> <S%H7290>sound<s%> <S%H7290>asleep.<s%>

So the <S%H9538>captain<s%> <S%H2259><s%> <S%H7126>approached<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> is it that you are <S%H7290>sleeping<s%>? <S%H6965>Get<s%> up, <S%H7121>call<s%> on your <S%H430>god.<s%> <S%H194>Perhaps<s%> [your] <S%H430>god<s%> will be <S%H9440>concerned<s%> about us so that we will not perish."

And <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H7453>mate,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> so we may <S%H3045>learn<s%> on <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H7945>account<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> [has struck] us." So they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H3124>Jonah.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5046>"Tell<s%> us, <S%H4994>now!<s%> On <S%H4310>whose<s%> account [has] <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> [struck] us? <S%H4100>What<s%> is your <S%H4399>occupation<s%>? And <S%H370>where<s%> do you <S%H935>come<s%> from? <S%H4100>What<s%> is your <S%H776>country<s%>? From <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> are you?"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I am a <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> and I <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land.<s%>"

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3372>became<s%> <S%H3374>extremely<s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H3372>frightened<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"How<s%> could you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%>?" For the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was <S%H1272>fleeing<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H5046>told<s%> them.

So they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> should we <S%H6213>do<s%> to you that the <S%H3220>sea<s%> may <S%H8367>become<s%> <S%H8367>calm<s%> for us?" â€“ for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> was <S%H1980>becoming<s%> <S%H1980>increasingly<s%> <S%H5590>stormy.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5375>"Pick<s%> me up and <S%H2904>throw<s%> me into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> Then the <S%H3220>sea<s%> will <S%H8367>become<s%> <S%H8367>calm<s%> for you, for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that on <S%H7945>account<s%> of me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>storm<s%> [has come] upon you."

However, the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2864>rowed<s%> [desperately] to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3004>land<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not, for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> was <S%H1980>becoming<s%> [even] <S%H5590>stormier<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

Then they <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H577>earnestly<s%> <S%H577>pray,<s%> <S%H577>O<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not let us perish on account of <S%H6>this<s%> man's <S%H2088>life<s%> and do not <S%H5315>put<s%> <S%H5414>innocent<s%> <S%H5355>blood<s%> on us; for Thou, O <S%H1818>Lord,<s%> hast <S%H3068>done<s%> as Thou hast <S%H6213>pleased.<s%>"
So they <S%H5375>picked<s%> up <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> <S%H2904>threw<s%> him into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5975>stopped<s%> its <S%H2197>raging.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1419>greatly,<s%> and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5087>made<s%> <S%H5088>vows.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4487>appointed<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1709>fish<s%> to <S%H1104>swallow<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> and <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was in the <S%H4578>stomach<s%> of the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
